name: Walking through!
description:
Project 1 summary

Walking through!

This is the project 1 for GSAS_2540_intro_to_gameprogramming course! Completed on September 23rd. 

This is a mini 2D game. After hitting the start button at the start scene, the game begins. The user could use the UI buttons to move the character around, and use the slider to manage music volumes and the toggle to turn on/off the background music. There are walls and borders that the player could not cross! The player has to retrieve the key and find the door to win the game! (Without the key, you cannot enter the door!) Feedback is provided at the top right corner for some actions such as colliding onto a wall or when receiving a key.
